articles.title: Indian-American Doctor Arrested In US For Masturbating Next To A Minor On Flight - NDTV
articles.description: A 33-year-old Indian American doctor has been arrested by the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) for allegedly exposing himself and masturbating next to a 14-year-old girl onboard a flight.
articles.content:
The incident took place in May last year on a flight from Honolulu to Boston. (Representative Pic)
